title: 820-00138 Doesn't see internal SSD
message:
Board had a short on Q7135 and U7190 was burned, that got fixed but board does not recognize SSD, already tried know good SSD with El Capitan and nothing, I have not tried BIOS yet.

PP3V3_S0SW_SSD_FLT 3.3V
PP3V3_S0 on pin 7 3.3V
SSD_RESET_CONN_L 0V
SSD_CLKREQ_CONN_L 3.3V
SSD_PCIE_SEL_L 3.3V
SMC_PWRFAIL_WARN_L 1.1V
SSD_PWR_FET_EN 3.3V

title: 820-00138 Doesn't see internal SSD
message:
Both reset and clock request signals are bad.
Post U3740 voltages (SSD inserted).

title: 820-00138 Doesn't see internal SSD
message:
U3740 with SSD connected

Pin 1 PP3V42_G3H_SSDSAK 3.4V
Pin 2 P3V3SSD_VMON 0V
Pin 3 SSD_RESET_L 3.3V
Pin 4 SSD_RESET_CONN_L 0V
Pin 6 SSD_CTRL_EN 3.3V
Pin 7 SSD_CLKREQ_CONN_L 0V
Pin 8 SSD_CLKREQ_L 0V

title: 820-00138 Doesn't see internal SSD
message: hi i got same problem but in my board  in area of P3V3_SSD_EN_L. When Q8072 is on place i get ground on this line. is it correct ? got orginal ssd mac didnt find it ,but when i use transcend ssd mac see him...
